test.name: Scenario: Create a new account in Ultimate QA page

kw.msg: No context open.

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://courses.ultimateqa.com/users/sign_in
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: When I click in the Create a new account button
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: And I fill out the form
Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.
kw.msg: ${EMAIL} = blfvuu

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.
kw.msg: ${PASSWORD} = dvacdtmn

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${EMAIL} = blfvuu

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${PASSWORD} = dvacdtmn

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'First Name Test' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'Last Name Test' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'blfvuu@gmail.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'dvacdtmn' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: And I click on Sign Up button
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Then The system enters the successfully logged in page
Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector xpath=//h2[contains(text(),'Products')] at state visible

kw.name: When I login with blank fields
Fill Text

kw.name: Then The system generates a error login message
Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector xpath=//li[contains(text(),'Invalid email or password.')] at state visible
